content: **now available in english and dutch nu beschikbaar in het nederlands ** **this little guy is quick to make but also fun and interesting ** the pattern includes bobble stitches for his little legs working in both loops and in back loop only and has multiple colour changes you can make him in joined rounds for cleaner colour changes links to tutorials in pattern or stick with continuous rounds he is great for using up yarn in your stash because different brands of yarn with different fibres can be used to make him - this would actually add fun texture and variety to his body he measures only 5 5 inches long when crocheted with worsted weight yarn the pattern includes detailed instructions and step-by-step photos plus you can contact me along the way to ask any questions it is an intermediate level pattern that involves starting with a magic_ring joined rounds if you want colour changes single_crochet increasing decreasing attaching pieces and working through both loops and back loop only **materials you will need ** - e us 3 5 mm hook - worsted weight yarn in three different colours approximately 9 3 yds 8 5 m for the face colour 18 5 yds 17 m for the antennae and feet colour and 6 2 yds 5 7 m for the last colour - yarn/tapestry needle - removable stitch markers - two 9 mm plastic safety eyes - polyester fiberfill stuffing note if you are making this amigurumi for someone under 3 yrs i recommend crocheting or embroidering the eyes instead of using the plastic safety eyes
